page.title: 17SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content: Sports facilities in the Hasbury area are mainly situated at Huntingtree. Here there is a football field,tennis courts,a bowling green and a playground for children. There are smaller play areas scattered among the housing estates. The football ground belonging to Cradley Town club took 12 months to be built.It is a full size pitch.On the right-hand side there is Caslon School,on the left-hand side there are allotments and fields.The pitch is about 22 years old.There is a changing room for the team and a club for visitors and supporters. Swimming is probably one of the most popular sports and the pool at Halesowen has got very good facilities.
